description:
Kualifikasi :

1. Pendidikan min S1 Teknik.

2. Usia maksimal 30 tahun.

3. Memiliki pengalaman di bidang import dan kepabeanan.

4. Aktif berkomunikasi dan berkorespondensi dalam Bahasa Inggris.

5. Memiliki kemampuan berbahasa Mandarin menjadi nilai plus.

6. Memiliki kemampuan analisa yang baik dengan rumus Excel.

7. Memiliki SIM A (Dapat mengendarai mobil).

 

Deskripsi Pekerjaan :

  1. Berkoordinasi dengan pihak eksternal (supplier/principal, forwarder, intansi pemerintah, dll) terkait proses pembelian produk hingga sampai ke gudang.
  2. Mengontrol dan monitoring proses pengiriman produk hingga sampai ke gudang.
  3. Mempersiapkan dokumen yang dibutuhkan dalam rangka proses import.
  4. Melakukan proses impor (PI) KEMENDAG dan Pertimbangan Teknis (PERTEK) KEMENPERIN beserta pelaporannya, Inpeksi KSO, SKI BPOM, dan Bea Cukai.
  5. Melakukan random checking saat produk tiba di gudang.
  6. Mengajukan complain ke Pihak Eksternal (Supplier/Principal, Forwarder, dll) jika terjadi produk yang tidak sesuai, baik secara kualitas kondisi produk.

  • Mempersiapkan dokumen yang dibutuhkan dalam rangka proses import.

  • Melakukan random checking saat produk tiba di gudang.
  • Mengajukan complain ke Pihak Eksternal (Supplier/Principal, Forwarder, dll) jika terjadi produk yang tidak sesuai, baik secara kualitas kondisi produk.

    •

Kualifikasi:

 

  • Pendidikan min. SMK/D3 jurusan Teknis Mesin/Teknik Elektrik/Teknik Elektro/Perkakas Mesin
  • Pengalaman minimal 2 tahun pada posisi yang sama
  • Memiliki pengalaman bekerja fabrikasi, bengkel atau kontraktor lebih diutamakan
  • Memiliki sertifikat las lebih diutamakan
  • Dapat bekerja secara proaktif, disiplin, teliti, jujur dan mandiri
  • Bersedia bekerja secara shift, masuk di hari Minggu dan Libur Nasional

    Lokasi kerja: Pondok Ungu, Bekasi

1. PROCUREMENT MANAGER
  • PROCUREMENT MANAGER

    • Persyaratan:

    • Usia maks. 35 tahun
    • Pendidikan min. D3 Teknik Sipil/Mekanikal/Sosial
    • Pengalaman min. 3 th sebagai Procurement Manager/ Purchasing Manager (dari perusahaan KONTRAKTOR lebih disukai)
    • Menguasai computer dan Microsoft office dan program perangkat lunak manajemen vendor

    • Tugas & Tanggung Jawab

    • Merencanakan & mereview   prosedur, kebijakan dan standar dept. procurement/purchasing  guna memberikan support terhadap operasional perusahaan untuk mencapai target yang telah ditetapkan
    • Melakukan pengadaan  material dan jasa (sub-kontraktor) untuk kebutuhan proyek & mengatur jadwal pengiriman sesuai prosedur yang berlaku

    • Mewakili perusahaan melakukan negosiasi  harga material & jasa, syarat dan ketentuan dengan pihak supplier dan sub-kontraktor agar memberikan manfaat terbaik dan profit bagi perusahaan
    • Memastikan semua administrasi & dokumentasi  pengadaan barang dan proses penerimaan dan pengiriman barang berjalan sesuai prosedur
    • Review dan monitor semua permintaan material dan jasa untuk memastikan semua permintaan terpenuhi tepat waktu
    • Merekomendasikan supplier atau sub-kontraktor baru untuk mendukung pemenuhan kebutuhan material/jasa dengan harga yang lebih bersaing dan jaminan mutu

job_title: Management Trainee (STAR - Sreeya Talent Acceleration and Readiness)
description:
• Fresh Graduate or having max 3 years work experience from engineering, especially from mechanical, industrial, electrical, food technology, mathematics,  statistics, Computer Engineering
  • GPA > 3.30
  • Fluent in english (min TOEFL 450)
  • Willing to be placed anywhere
  • Active in organization and / or participate in national / organizational competition
  • https://bit.ly/STARprogram2025
  • Fresh Graduate or having max 3 years work experience from engineering, especially from mechanical, industrial, electrical, food technology, mathematics,  statistics, Computer Engineering
  • GPA > 3.30
  • Fluent in english (min TOEFL 450)
  • Willing to be placed anywhere
  • Active in organization and / or participate in national / organizational competition
  • https://bit.ly/STARprogram2025

    •

Qualifications :

  1. Bachelor's degree in Mechanical / Civil Engineering from reputable university
  2. Minimum has five years of working experience in related field
  3. Proficient in using computers, MS Project
  4. Microsoft Office, Auto CAD, Hand Sketch / 3D Sketch Up and other 3 software
  5. Ready to work on deadlines and able to work together in a team
  6. Have Driving License SIM A & C
  7. Detail, thorough, honest and responsible
  8. Willing to be placed in all project location throughout Indonesia

    Job Descriptions :

    1. In charge of Manpower settings:
        - Prepare, propose and fulfill the need for the number of Manpower in accordance with the volume of work in the field, in coordination with the Site Manager and HRD at Head Office
        - Prepare all of needs by Manpower in the field of Meal - Accommodation - Transportation in coordination with Site Manager and Purchasing at Head Office
        - Monitor the presence of Manpower in the field, with daily attendance monitoring
    2. Assigned in terms of setting Machine / Work Tools:
        - Prepare, propose and fulfill the need for Work Tools needed for work in the field, in coordination with the Site Manager and Purchasing parties at Head Office
        - Monitor the use of work tools as needed and their recording and maintenance
    3. In charge of the arrangement of Material Availability:
        - Monitor and make plans for Material Requirements needed for the work of at least the next 1 (one) month, coordinating with Site Manager and Purchasing Head Office
    4. In charge of making, compiling, and implementing work methods:
        - Coordinate with all Internal Teams, Vendors, so that it is agreed on the Plan of Work Methods to be implemented, and Targets can be achieved properly.
        - Responsible for the Occupational Safety and Health of the Team at the job site
        - Responsible for the Availability of Work Tools, Materials, which are needed for the work process in the field
        - Responsible for Actual Receiving Material
        - Responsible for the Actual Progress of Work Implementation, both internal and external calculations (vendors)
    5. Responsible for the implementation and implementation of the Management System
    6. Carry out other tasks from Project Manager related to

Job Description:

1. Track the progress of cargo transportation: monitor the transportation status of goods in real time to ensure that they arrive at their destination on time and deal with problems in transportation in a timely manner. 

2. Coordinate transportation arrangements: Communicate and coordinate with customers, carriers, warehouses and other parties to arrange loading, unloading, storage and delivery to ensure a smooth logistics process. 

3. Handling customs clearance matters: assisting in the customs declaration and customs clearance procedures of goods, preparing relevant documents to ensure compliance with import and export regulations. 

4. Manage transportation costs: Calculate freight, storage fees, insurance premiums and other expenses, control transportation costs, and update quotations regularly. 

5. Solve unexpected problems: deal with delays, damages, losses and other emergencies in transportation, and actively look for solutions to protect the interests of customers. 

6. Customer Service Support: Answer customers' questions about transportation, provide professional advice, maintain good customer relationships, and improve customer satisfaction. 

7. Organize and archive documents: Responsible for the management and filing of transportation-related documents, including bills of lading, invoices, customs clearance documents, etc., to ensure the integrity of the information. 

8. Supplier management: experience in the development of shipping companies and freight forwarding companies and management of suppliers, and understanding of inquiry and quotation.

9. Risk Management: Familiar with Indonesian customs regulations, international sea and air freight insurance, and claims procedures; able to effectively use these rules to help clients mitigate operational risks.

 

Job Requirements:

1. Education: Bachelor degree or above, major in logistics management, international trade, supply chain management and other related majors is preferred. 

2. Work experience: at least 3-5 years freight forwarder 

3. Language skills: Good command and speaking of English 

4. Supplier management ability: development and management 

5. Risk Management: Familiar with Indonesian customs regulations, insurance and claims rules for international sea and air transportation 

6. Communication and coordination skills: excellent communication skills, able to effectively coordinate customers, suppliers and internal teams, with a strong sense of customer service.

7. Cost management and control: Have the ability of cost accounting and control, be able to effectively manage transportation expenses and improve operational efficiency. 

8. Problem solving ability: Able to quickly respond to and solve unexpected problems in the transportation process to ensure the smooth progress of the project. 

9. Team Leadership: Ability to lead and develop teams that motivate team members to achieve performance goals.

10. Data analysis and reporting capabilities: Ability to analyze data and be able to optimize processes and generate reports based on operational data to support decision-making. 

11. Preferred qualifications: Possession of PPJK certification.

Kualifikasi:

  • Pendidikan minimal S1 semua jurusan
  • Usia maksimal 40 tahun
  • Pengalaman di posisi yang sama minimal 5 tahun (diutamakan dari industri Consumer Goods)
  • Memiliki kemampuan manajemen, operasional, marketing secara baik
  • Memiliki leadership yang kuat, target oriented, dan komunikatif
  • Memiliki pemahaman tentang isu-isu sosial di wilayah penempatan
  • Menguasai Ms. Office (Word, Excel, Powerpoint)
  • Memiliki SIM A dan SIM C
  • Diutamakan berdomisili di wilayah Solo

A retail garment sales executive plays a vital role in a clothing store, helping drive sales and create positive customer experiences. Here are key skills and attributes that should be looked for in a candidate for this role

Reqruitments:

  • Candidates must have at least a high school, diploma, degree in Business, Administration, Management, Marketing, Arts, Design, Creative Multimedia, Textiles, Fashion Design or equivalent.
  • 3 year experience (SPB / SPG Retail, Clothing, Fashion)
  • Fluent in English (Writing & Speaking)
  • Maximum age 35 years
  • Must-have skills: Customer Service Skills, Relationship Building, Negotiation Skills, Body Language Awareness, Visual Merchandising Knowledge, Fashion Sense and Trend Awareness
  • Can drive a motorbike, have a SIM card C
  • Diligent, Disciplined, and Initiative, Willing to work on holidays
  • Dress neatly
  • Domiciled in Surabaya

Job Summary: 

The Business Analyst will play a critical role in supporting the Management by providing data-driven insights, strategic recommendations, and operational analysis. This position requires a proactive individual who can effectively support all President Director’s day-to-day schedule to ensure all the company’s initiatives are well delivered.

 

Responsibilities:

  • Provide the information and data as needed by the Management.
  • Develop material in monthly and quarterly strategic meetings (e.g., BOC, BOD, or Board Forum meetings).
  • Efficiently manage the Management’s schedule, organize meetings, handle communications, prepare necessary materials, and act as the Management’s representative.
  • Completes a broad variety of administrative tasks for the Management including managing an extremely active calendar of appointments; completing expense reports; composing and preparing correspondence that is sometimes confidential; arranging complex and detailed travel plans, itineraries, and agendas; and compiling documents for travel-related meetings
  • Act as a liaison between the Management’s office and various departments, fostering collaboration and effective communication to follow up on a few initiatives according to the company’s prioritization.
  • Took the role of personal contact when the leader is not available.
  • Develop and maintain dashboards and reports to track key performance indicators (KPIs).
  • Lead cross-functional projects, ensuring timely delivery and adherence to strategic goals.
  • Facilitate project meetings, documenting progress and providing updates to the President Director.
  • Prepare presentations and reports for the Management and other stakeholders, translating complex data into clear and concise narratives.

  • Prepare presentations and reports for the Management and other stakeholders, translating complex data into clear and concise narratives.

    •  

    Qualifications:

    • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business Administration, or a related field

Jakarta Premium Outlets® Tangerang City is a premium shopping mall that aims for world-class shopping destination. We are currently recruiting employees for the operational and management team at Alam Sutera Tangerang Indonesia, please see the position below which is suitable for you to apply according to your experiences, skills and competencies.

 

This role is for Supervisor Level.

 

  1. Assist Leasing team in executing the leasing process for the center.
  2. Prepare and maintain Lease Agreements.
  3. Leasing administration and documentation.
  • Assist Leasing team in executing the leasing process for the center.
  • Prepare and maintain Lease Agreements.
  • Leasing administration and documentation.

    •  

    Duties & Responsibilities

    1. Must be able to prepare Lease Agreements.
    2. Follow up with internal and external parties on agreement signing and maintain up-to-date records of all Lease Agreements.
    3. Carry out lease admin works i.e. prepare, circulate to internal departments & file all leasing offer letters / proposal forms / tenancy variation forms / termination letter / exit form / tenancy instruction / leasing correspondences.
    4. Ensure all leasing data are entered into the system accurately and timely.
    5. To do submission for stamping of signed agreements.
    6. Maintain accurate records of tenancy transactions, tenant details and other relevant information.
    7. Track and monitor all tenancy administrative documentation till completion.
    8. Prepare and manage monthly expenses claims for the Leasing Department.
    9. Perform other ad-hoc duties as assigned by the superior.

    •

    2. Minimum 2-3 years’ Executive Leasing Admin experience (shopping malls).
    3. Understand the principles and procedures of leasing administration.
    4. Possess excellent interpersonal skills with good command of written and spoken English.
    5. Computer literate with strong proficiency in Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, PowerPoint).
    6. Thorough, honest, and disciplined.
    7. A team player, efficient, attentive to details and with strong analytical skills.
    8. Resourceful, self-motivated and able to work under pressure with tight deadlines.
    9. Willing to work in Alam Sutera.
    10. Priority to candidates who can report to work at short notice.

Marketing Communication (MarCom) Staff

 

Star Champs Indonesia adalah pusat intervensi anak usia dini, baik untuk anak berkebutuhan khusus (ABK) / neurodiversitas maupun anak neurotipikal.

 

Berasosiasi dengan Champions Club USA, Star Champs menghadirkan kurikulum holistik yang bertujuan untuk mengoptimalkan sensori-motorik, kognitif serta wicara anak sehingga potensi setiap anak dapat bersinar. 

 

Deskripsi Pekerjaan : 

  • Menentukan strategi pemasaran secara online dan offline secara inovatif.
  • Melakukan riset konsumen dan membuat report.
  • Mengembangkan konten dan melakukan kampanye terkait.
  • Mencari dan menjalin kerjasama dengan sekolah, media, dan event sesuai target marketing.
  • Membuat rancangan dan persiapan kebutuhan event (kalender, proposal serta budget).
  • Menjalin relasi yang baik dengan vendor.
  • Bertanggung jawab pada proses loading in and out saat event berlangsung.
  • Bekerjasama dengan Digital Marketing Staff terkait konten di sosial media maupun konten promosi.

PT. Cosmax Indonesia is a no 1 Toll Manufacturing cosmetic in Indonesia since 2011 with the head quarter is in South Korea and developed the best quality cosmetic product in the world. PT. Cosmax Indonesia services is original development manufacturing (ODM), original equipment manufacturing (OEM) and original branding manufacturing (OBM) in cosmetic industries. 

Our vision in 2025 is TO BE NO ONE TOLL MANUFACTURING IN SOUTH EAST ASIAN. For reach our vision, we need Two (2) Person to join with us for Staff Management (KOREAN SPECIALIST) . This position will be work in Team Research & Innovation (Team RNI)

 

*Disclaimer : 
1. To apply this job, make sure your self can speak & write in Korean (industrial/manufacture Korean) actively and willing to interview by offline in our office (South & East Jakarta). 

2. You have active mobile phone and email, we will contact you by email and phone 
 

Role & Responsible as Staff Management (Korean Specialist) 

  1. Conduct meeting (daily, weekly, monthly) for the report of Team RNI
  2. Handling R&I sample shipment to others branches (South Korea, Australia, China, and others)
  3. Handle & problem solve of issue for the shipment
  4. Monitoring R&I laboratory supply availability 
  5. Monitoring R&I laboratory inventory (Raw Material, Packaging Material)
  6. Monitoring also arranging R&I sample storage
  7. Reporting for R&I division to South Korea
  8. Attend meeting R&I & also South Korea team

A fast-growing law firm is looking for a Finance and Administration Staff to support the financial and operational aspects of the firm. 

 

The Finance and Administration Staff will assist the firm with its accounting and financial matters. The staff will also be required to perform general administration matters, including maintaining records/filing, preparing reports, etc.

  • Have a minimum GPA of 3.00.

  • Have good communication and presentation skills.

Job Descriptions:

  • Lead the development and execution of e-commerce strategies, optimizing digital channels for sales, brand engagement, and consumers acquisition. Drive digital marketing efforts across various channels, ensuring alignment with overall brand and business objectives.    
  • Collaborate closely with the e-commerce team to enhance platform performance, user experience, and conversion rates. Collaborate with regional and global PC teams to align local strategies with broader company goals.                                                                                 
  • Conduct in-depth analysis of market trends, competitor activities, and consumer behaviour to identify opportunities and threats. Translate insights into actionable recommendations and strategic initiatives, driving innovation and differentiation in product offerings, marketing campaigns, and consumer experiences.                  
  • Stay abreast of industry developments, technological advancements, and regulatory changes that may impact consumer preferences and market dynamics                                       
  • Collaborate with internal stakeholders and external partners, including research agencies and industry experts, to leverage collective knowledge and expertise in shaping strategic decisions. Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of implemented strategies, continuously refining approaches based on performance feedback and evolving market conditions.
  • Spearhead the development of the annual marketing plan, encompassing strategic objectives, key initiatives, budget allocation, and KPIs.
  • Identify and capitalize on revenue optimization opportunities through pricing strategies, promotional activities, and product bundling initiatives, SKU profitability and customer profitability focused. 
  • Develop and execute comprehensive 360-degree marketing plans that integrate digital and traditional channels to maximize reach, engagement, and impact, including sampling programs, trial and conversion programs, among others.                             
  • Handle other key areas of brand management and development, sales team collaboration and pricing strategy, product development support, team leadership and development, budget management, marketing performance measurement and reporting                            
  • Other assignment, tasks and projects based on Management discretion

    • Min. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field; Master's degree preferred.
    • Proven experience at least 10 years in marketing leadership roles within the consumer goods or personal care industry.

  • Menyusun Laporan Keuangan (bulanan & Tahunan) dan menyiapkan Proyeksi Keuangan
  • Bank Rekonsiliasi, depresiasi dan tugas akunting lainnya.
  • Menangani semua aspek Pajak yang ada di perusahaan (Perseorangan dan Badan)
  • Memonitor anggaran pengeluaran/pendapatan perusahaan secara periodik (mingguan dan bulanan)

    •  

    Persyaratan :

    1. Pendidikan min. D3 Accounting/Pajak
    2. Pengalaman min 2 tahun sebagai Accounting & Tax Officer 
    3. Mempunyai Sertifikat Brevet A, B dan C
    4. Bisa mengoperasikan e spm / e spt / DJP Online
    5. Menguasai ACCURATE Accounting System (diutamakan)
    6. Jujur, Teliti, disiplin dan siap bekerja dengan dateline
    7. Bisa bekerjasama dengan tim atau mandiri dengan supervisi terbatas
    8. Lokasi penempatan : Kembangan - JAKARTA BARAT.

description:
PT Nusantara Sejahtera Raya (NSR) also known as Cinema XXI is recognized as the industry leader and the iconic destination for movie-goers in Indonesia. With more than 30 years of experience in the movie exhibition industry, Cinema XXI is committed to always providing the best-in-class amenities and affordable movie-going experience for Indonesians. For always make a good improvement, absolutely we're always seeking someone who has enthusiastic and good personality to join our team with qualifications below.

PT. Era Manunggal Sejahtera merupakan perusahaan yang bergerak di bidang distribusi alat kesehatan yang sudah berdiri sejak tahun 2016 hingga sekarang.

Saat ini kami membutuhkan karyawan dengan posisi sebagai Telemarketing. Berikut dibawah ini deskripsi jobdesk dan spesifikasi di antaranya :

Job Description : 
1. Memperkenalkan dan menawarkan produk ke customer 
2. Melakukan penjualan sesuai dengan target penjualan yang telah ditentukan
3. Memiliki minat belajar hal baru khususnya product knowledge dan competitor knowledge untuk memberikan informasi dan spesifikasi produk ke customer  
4. Menangani keluhan customer 
5. Membuat laporan pekerjaan secara berkala

Requirement :
1. Usia max. 30 tahun 
2. Pendidikan minimal SMA/Sederajat
3. Memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 1 tahun di bidang yang sama
4. Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi & negosiasi dengan baik dan sopan 
5. Mampu mengoperasikan komputer, ms. office, sosial media & telepon

Tanggung Jawab

  • Melakukan riset masalah perpajakan dan memberikan rekomendasi untuk efisiensi pajak.
  • Bekerja sama dengan tim keuangan dan hukum untuk memastikan kepatuhan pajak dalam kegiatan bisnis.
